name: How to request a blank/clone installation in ATLAS-chat (Ipsos/Kantar)
title: How to request a blank/clone installation in ATLAS-chat (Ipsos/Kantar)
body:
Overview

This article gives you a quick rundown of how to properly request a blank/clone installation in the DXi Support portal

NOTE: THIS ARTICLE IS MEANT TO BE INTERNAL FOR THE TIME BEING, AS IT IS ONLY AIMED AT KANTAR/IPSOS. A PDF COPY OF IT WAS SHARED WITH EMIN, TO CIRCULATE IT FURTHER WITH THESE 2 CUSTOMERS.

Instructions

  1. Login to the DXi Support portal: https://discoverxi-supportdesk.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/
  2. Click on the chat bubble at the bottom-right
  3. You will be greeted by ATLAS-chat, and it will ask you for your instance URL
  4. Once you provide the instance URL, you will have the option to request for a New installation
  5. Type in New installation
  6. Choose the type of installation you are requesting using the provided buttons
  7. At this stage, you will have 3 options:

    1. Just type in the request, making sure you include all required details - ATLAS-chat will pickup the details from your input and confirm them with you before proceeding further
    2. I want to fill a form - this will bring up a form which will let you insert those details
    3. Create ticket - this will allow you to freely write down your request into ATLAS-chat; however, note that it is extremely important that you provide us at least with the details asked by ATLAS
  8.  Once you submit the request details, ATLAS will process your request and create a ticket for you, and you will be provided with a ticket number, along with a direct URL to access it.
